flounder.networking

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • flounder.networking.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
    A server that can send data to clients and relieve data.
